Thriller.title: JACK RYAN
Thriller.description: An up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into a dangerous field assignment as he uncovers a pattern in terrorist communication that launches him into the center of a dangerous gambit.

Thriller.title: BLACK MIRROR
Thriller.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Thriller.title: MONEY HEIST
Thriller.description: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

Thriller.title: Breaking Bad
Thriller.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

Horror.title: THE WALKING DEAD
Horror.description: A group of survivors try to find a cure for a zombie outbreak while dealing with various other survivors.

Horror.title: PENNY DREADFUL
Horror.description: Explorer Sir Malcolm Murray, American gunslinger Ethan Chandler, scientist Victor Frankenstein and medium Vanessa Ives unite to combat supernatural threats in Victorian London.

Horror.title: TERROR
Horror.description: Supernatural, semihistorical, horror anthology series, where each season is inspired by a different infamous or mysterious real life historical tragedy.

Fantasy Drama.title: GAME OF THRONES
Fantasy Drama.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

Fantasy Drama.title: STRANGER THINGS
Fantasy Drama.description: A group of people who are strangers in a foreign land attempt to survive in a hostile land.

Fantasy Drama.title: HARRY POTTER
Fantasy Drama.description: Harry Potter is a series of fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the life of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Science Fiction.title: THE MANDALORIAN
Science Fiction.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Science Fiction.title: WESTWORLD
Science Fiction.description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

Science Fiction.title: EXPANSE
Science Fiction.description: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.
